channel.title: Can I use OnionShare 2.4 in VirtualBox environment(Whonix-XFCE-16.0.3.1)?
channel.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/OnionShare
When I downloaded OnionShare as a guide from the Whonix wiki, the version of OnionShare is 2.2. The 2.2 version does not include the Chat function, so I want to install and use the 2.4 version, is there a way?

item.title: Can I use OnionShare 2.4 in VirtualBox environment(Whonix-XFCE-16.0.3.1)?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Dev/OnionShare - Whonix

Flatpak installed OnionShare does not listen on all network interfaces but 127.0.0.1 only. It is therefore unreachable from Whonix-Gateway ™. This is because file /usr/share/anon-ws-base-files/workstation does not exist inside the Flatpak folder.

related:

github.com

onionshare/onionshare/blob/develop/cli/onionshare_cli/web/web.py#L360_L364

    
      
    
          
  1. """
    2. 
          
  2. self.common.log("Web", "start", f"port={port}")
    3. 
          
  3. 
          
    4. 

  4. # Make sure the stop_q is empty when starting a new server
    5. 
          
  5. while not self.stop_q.empty():
    6. 
          
  6.     try:
    7. 
          
  7.         self.stop_q.get(block=False)
    8. 
          
  8.     except queue.Empty:
    9. 
          
  9.         pass
    10. 
          
  10. 
          
    11. 

  11. # In Whonix, listen on 0.0.0.0 instead of 127.0.0.1 (#220)
    12. 
          
  12. if os.path.exists("/usr/share/anon-ws-base-files/workstation"):
    13. 
          
  13.     host = "0.0.0.0"
    14. 
          
  14. else:
    15. 
          
  15.     host = "127.0.0.1"
    16. 
          
  16. 
          
    17. 

  17. self.running = True
    18. 
          
  18. if self.mode == "chat":
    19. 
          
  19.     self.socketio.run(self.app, host=host, port=port)
    20. 
          
  20. else:
    21. 
          
  21.     self.app.run(host=host, port=port, threaded=True)
    22.

Does the following help?

sudo mkdir /var/lib/flatpak/app/org.onionshare.OnionShare/current/active/files/share/anon-ws-base-files

sudo touch /var/lib/flatpak/app/org.onionshare.OnionShare/current/active/files/share/anon-ws-base-files/workstation
